Reviews.Title: “3rd world standard”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: type hotel expect experience london quality poor bathrooms inadequate shared furniture poor bedsheets blankets dirty cheap £10 twice worth elsewhere time

Reviews.Title: “Is what is says on the tin: Budget accommodation in Fabulous location”
Reviews.Author: Livelylass13
Reviews.Content: budget guest house don’t expect frills location fantastic easy 7min walk kings cross station facilities simple totally adequate tv kettle condiments free wifi sink shared bathroom toilet don’t fooled initial impressions dark lighting makes look grubby look closer clean whitest sheets i’ve seen staff accommodating friendly polite

HotelInfo.Name: Budget Guest House
HotelInfo.Address: 23 Swinton Street | Kings Cross, London WC1X 9NL, England
